channel.title: Stackery on Rupak Ganguly
channel.description: Recent content in Stackery on Rupak Ganguly

item.title: Building Serverless Apps Using Stackery
item.description: This is a multi-part blog series that will explore building serverless application with Stackery. In this post, the first part in the series, we discuss why Stackery is a great platform for visually building and deploying serverless applications on AWS. We will also look at setting up Stackery, linking an AWS account securely with least priviledges, and using a boilerplate template to build and deploy a serverless application to AWS.
